import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Flight } from '../flight'; @Component({ selector: 'app-create-flight', templateUrl: './create-flight.component.html', styleUrls: ['./create-flight.component.css'] }) export class CreateFlightComponent implements OnInit { flight: Flight = new Flight(); constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void { } onSubmit(){ console.log(this.flight); //this.saveFlight(); } }

Create Flight
